extendedInfo.description: Are you planning a visit to Lower Silesia? Would you like to learn more about tourist, cultural and sports attractions? Use the Lower Silesia Guide application, which will immediately deliver to your phone all necessary information regarding the event organized in Lower Silesia. Sport, culture, tourism, interesting places - the most up-to-date information about the region now available directly on your phone.Basic functions: * The source of the most interesting tourist sites * Up-to-date information regarding cultural and sports events * Geolocalization and driving/walking directions * Calendar of events * Complete integration with Google.Maps * Social media (connected with Facebook) * Four language versions available: Polish, English, German and Czech * Wroclaw, Legnica, Jelenia Gora, Walbrzych among other cites from the region.The application was created at the request and in cooperation withMarshal Office of Lower SilesiaThe application created by: 3MD sp. z o.o. & Joy Intermedia.
